sentences.en: But we must continue our efforts, for only so can we achieve its final overthrow.
sentences.cn: 但是还须我们继续努力, 才能最后地消灭它.

sentences.en: Contemporary art especially the art of this century, has chosen to overthrow tradition.
sentences.cn: 当代艺术,特别是这个世纪的艺术, 已经选择了颠覆传统.

sentences.en: Haven't his men come to you to explore and spy out the country and overthrow it?
sentences.cn: 他的臣仆来见你不是为详察窥探,倾覆这地 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was exiled to the areas after his attempt to overthrow the king had failed.
sentences.cn: 在推翻国王的企图失败以后,他被放逐到边疆.

sentences.en: He was trying, he said, " to overthrow the heathen temples throughout the world. "
sentences.cn: 他说他是想要 “ 在全世界废除异教徒的神庙 ”.

sentences.en: I have aided in the overthrow of prejudices and errors.
sentences.cn: 我出力打破了邪说和谬见.

sentences.en: It accept the person of the wicked, to overthrow the righteous in judgment.
sentences.cn: 5瞻徇恶人的情面,偏断义人的案件, 都为不善.

sentences.en: It is difficult to determine what caused Copernicus to overthrow the fourteen - hundred - year - old Ptolemaic theory.
sentences.cn: 很难断定什么原因使Copernicus抛弃了有1400年之久的 Ptolemaic 理论.

sentences.en: Rebels were already making plans to overthrow the government.
sentences.cn: 反叛者已在密谋颠覆政府。

sentences.en: The country was declared following the overthrow of the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 该国推翻君主制之后,宣布正式建国.

sentences.en: The organization was dedicated to the overthrow of capitalism.
sentences.cn: 该组织致力于推翻资本主义。

sentences.en: The overthrow of capitalism would undoubtedly a huge step forward.
sentences.cn: 推翻资本主义无疑会显现出很大的进步.

sentences.en: The overthrow of mother - right was the world historical defeat of the female sex.
sentences.cn: 母权制的被推翻,乃是女性的具有世界历史意义的失败.

sentences.en: These feelings are likely to make people attempt to overthrow the system.
sentences.cn: 这些情绪有可能促使人们想要推翻现行的体制。

sentences.en: They attempted to overthrow the monarch.
They were charged with plotting the overthrow of the state.
sentences.cn: 他们被控密谋颠覆国家。

sentences.en: You also could overthrow a bear if you chose to go out and encounter him.
sentences.cn: 您如果想跟熊较量一下的话,也一定能够把它打翻在地的.

trans.tran_cn: 推翻，打倒，打翻，倾倒，[棒]投得过高的球
trans.tran_en: the defeat and removal from power of a leader or government, especially by force
to remove a leader or government from power, especially by force

trans.tran_cn: 打倒，推翻，使屈服，征服，使瓦解，撞倒
trans.tran_en: to remove a leader or government from power, especially by force
